CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Solara Sugarbeet relative to GeoNuts?
SRP.A: Solara Sugarbeet is {below} GeoNuts in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Solara Sugarbeet relative to Terran Spice Mix?
SRP.A: Solara Sugarbeet is {above} Terran Spice Mix in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AquaBeans relative to Terran Spice Mix?
SRP.A: AquaBeans is {above} Terran Spice Mix in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total fertilizer price?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Skyberry Pulp}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total fertilizer price?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Terran Spice Mix}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Lumina Grain's maximum Fertilizer Price in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Lumina Grain's maximum Fertilizer Price is in {1980}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is AquaBeans's minimum Fertilizer Price in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: AquaBeans's minimum Fertilizer Price is in {1968}.

NC.Q: Was the total Fertilizer Price in 1970 higher or lower than in 1971?
NC.A: The total fertilizer price in 1970 was {lower} than in 1971.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1985, did the total Fertilizer Price experience a larger or smaller change than between 1972 and 1973?
NC.A: The change in total fertilizer price between 1968 and 1985 was {larger} than between 1972 and 1973.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1971, was the average total Fertilizer Price higher or lower than between 1980 and 1985?
NC.A: The average total fertilizer price between 1968 and 1971 was {lower} than between 1980 and 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1985, was the average total Fertilizer Price higher or lower than between 1980 and 1982?
NC.A: The average total fertilizer price between 1984 and 1985 was {higher} than between 1980 and 1982.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Skyberry Pulp} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Zephyr Cotton and Lumina Grain first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Zephyr Cotton and Lumina Grain first exchanged leading positions in {1967}.
